judgment_summary: After hearing the learned counsel for the petitioner and without expressing any opinion as to the merits of the case, and without prejudice to the rights of either party, the Trial Court is directed to finally dispose of the case within a period of three months from the judgment date, even if the proceedings are taken on a day-to-day basis. The petition is disposed of with this observation.
Decision_or_verdict: Petition disposed of with directions to Trial Court.
summary_vector_notes: The case involved a petition by Afzaal Ahmed against The State. The Supreme Court directed the Trial Court to conclude the case within three months, emphasizing expedited proceedings. No opinion was expressed on the merits of the case.
